description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Tempesta FW rate limits are not enabled by default. They are either set too large to capture empty CONTINUATION frames attacks or too small to handle normal HTTP requests appropriately.

Los límites de velocidad de Tempesta FW no están habilitados de forma predeterminada. O están configurados demasiado grandes para capturar ataques de frames de CONTINUACIÓN vacíos o demasiado pequeños para manejar adecuadamente las solicitudes HTTP normales.
